tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Good experience. My mom had Hand and leg pain but after 3-4 visits my mom got good relief and she is very happy with the treatment   the behaviour of the doctor is very professional and takes good care of the patients. He immediately catched the problem and started the treatment with proper instructions.

Dr. Sarang Deshpande is compassionate, attentive, and always prioritizes their patients' well-being. his skillful approach to both surgical and non-surgical treatments has made a significant positive impact on my life. I highly recommend Dr. Sarang Deshpande at Wockhardt Hospital for anyone seeking outstanding orthopedic care in the Mira Road area.

Dr.Sarang Deshpande is an exceptional Orthopaedic surgeon.From .y first consultation to post-operative care,doctor demonstrated a high level of expertise and professionalism and compassion.The doctor thoroughly explained my condition and the surgical addressing all my concerns with patience.I highly recommend Dr.Sarang. Deshpande to anyone seeking orthopaedic care . Their dedication to patient well being is truly commendable.
Myself admitted for surgery to Wockhardt Hospital, Mira Road. Dr Sarang was very helpful and during my stay, I was so comfortable. Felt like home. The nursing staff was also caring and supportive.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My Husband had a sprain in his neck and it was so bad that he could even speak about it he would cry in pain Dr Sarang said nothing to worry about some hot water fermentation and prescribed some medicines and in a day or two he was perfectly alright. Would definitely recommend Dr Sarang for any orthopaedic issues he definitely knows the best.

Doctor was very  professional  he explained  in such a way for which  I was satisfied  and convinced  to opt treatment  from  him. He had great  skill while performing operation he make patient very  comfortable  while performing operation

**** ************* * experienced doctor.
He swiftly made me understand my concern n prescribed medication.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had a very good experience of  Dr. Sarang Deshpande. My pain reduced by his prescribed medication. Thankyou doctor for helping me..
Calm and poised doctor. Friendly when it comes to explaning the patient. Listens very carefully. Appreciative nature.
appointment given at 5pm, clinic was closed, no one picking pH, dr was absent, wrong appointment given,..no communication between practo and clinic
